TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You are awarded with a NASA super-comuter solely dedicated to KSP and the internet. However, out of jealousy for your ability to create massive crafts with no FPS drop, several hundred users decide to DDOS you while physically assaulting your home to uncover the technology you have.

I wish that I could wish more wishes

Granted, you actualy do

I wish for fusion reactor

Granted, but it explodes and you are incinerated.

I wish for an Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device.

Grabted, but you look down the operational end of the device.

I wish I didn't make that spelling error.

Granted, you make a grammar error instead.

I wish i had telekenisis.

Granted, but once you move an object you cannot stop it.

I wish for a lovely bunch of coconuts.

Granted, it fall on your head

I wish I never read the The Rainbow Factory

Granted. since you never read it, the compulsion to read it comes about again.

I wish for .22 to come out within the next week.

Granted, it come out, but it's crappy / buggy

I wish to be 20% cooler

Edited October 11, 2013 by mrrpamplemousse

Granted, 20% of your temperature measured in Kelvin (309Ã‚Â° Kelvin - 20 % (61,8Ã‚Â°) = 247,2Ã‚Â° Kelvin = -25,95Ã‚Â° Celsius. Have fun freezing =)

I wished I could hear Radio frequencies in my head

Granted, but they are on 24/7 and at a massive volume with all the frequencies at the same time.

I wish for more boosters

Granted, but you forgot the structs

I wish for more people on Your avatar is stuck in an elevator... thread

Granted. it gets stale with the same people posting.

I wish for time to hurry up.

Granted, but your real life physics run on rails

I wish I could build a working space plane

Granted, but you don't have fuel

I wish to visit The Rainbow Factory

Granted, but you can't control what you receive and have to wear a tinfoil hat to avoid going crazy.

I wish for a nobel prize in chemistry.

Granted, you get it for creating a dangerous toxin that will cause the WW3

I wish somebody that explain me what burntphoenix said

Granted, but that person only speaks Arabic

I want to discover a planet made out of Mountain Dew

Granted, but the atmosphere is pure vaporized caffeine and you die of suffocation

i wish for better attentions spans for everybody.

Can't corrup this, I also want it!

I wish that I won the Google Picture War

Granted, the prize is a rotten banana.

I wish KW had the parts I needed to finish my Soyuz FB replica.

granted, but once they come out with them .22 breaks the mod.

I wish for more people who want to corrupt my wishes.

Granted, you get me and me only.

I wish to get this art block off of me

Fine, but the only ideas that come are dirty and illegal (I assume an "art block" is a lack of ideas for art?)

I wish for bacon.

It's rotten

I wish of M.Wolfy
